ygData.subject: Re: Gator Leggings?
ygData.msgSnippet: Donzi paid 1000 plat for my gator leggins on The Rathe about 6 weeks ago.  I think the price was a bit high, but the time and aggravation to do the camp is
ygData.messageBody:
Donzi paid 1000 plat for my gator leggins on The Rathe about 6 weeks ago. I
think the price was a bit high, but the time and aggravation to do the camp
is worse. It's easier for us to just go kill ogre guards where at least we
are safe and get experience, and make the 1000 plat, than to sit and camp
the stupid croc, IF it's not camped, which most of the time it is.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: "J Hoppe" <jhoppe1@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 10:55 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Gator Leggings?


> From: "J Hoppe" <jhoppe1@...>
>
> I am trying to get some gator leggings on Erollisi Marr.
>
> I am willing to buy or trade but I have yet to meet anyone with a
reasonable
> offer.
>
> What would be a good plat amount for them, and what would be a reasonable
> trade for them?
>
> I have heard they go for 600 plat. I also tried trading a plat armband and
a
> Black Pearl Choker, and the guy would even return my replys.
>
> I do have a extra charred guardian shield, but I do not feel that it
should
> be a straight trade (leggings for shield).
>
> Any help is (as always) greatly appreciated,
>
> Jeff
> Cadfael, 34 lv, EM
>
>
